# Deploying Docs

## Publishing

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/index.md): Learn about the ways to publish a .NET application. .NET can publish platform-specific or cross-platform apps. You can publish an app as self-contained or as framework-dependent. Each mode affects how a user runs your app.
- [Create a NuGet package with the CLI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/creating-nuget-packages.md): Learn how to create a NuGet package with the 'dotnet pack' command.
- [Self-contained deployment runtime roll forward](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/runtime-patch-selection.md): Learn about dotnet publish changes for self-contained deployments.
- [ReadyToRun](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/ready-to-run.md): Learn what ReadyToRun deployments are and why you should consider using it as part of the publishing your app with .NET 5 and .NET Core 3.0 and later.
- [Publish .NET apps for macOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/macos.md): Learn how to publish .NET applications for macOS, including signing, notarization, and app entitlements.
- [Runtime package store](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/runtime-store.md): Learn how to use the runtime package store to target manifests used by .NET Core.

## Children

- [Native Aot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/llms.txt)
- [Single File](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/single-file/llms.txt)
- [Trimming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/trimming/llms.txt)
